original_text: But after all that, they have turned against God. Then it is impossible for anyone to help them to turn away from their sins again. It is like they are killing the Son of God on the cross again for themselves. They show other people that they do not think Christ is important.
korean_text: 타락한 자들은 다시 새롭게 하여 회개하게 할 수 없나니 이는 그들이 하나님의 아들을 다시 십자가에 못 박아 드러내 놓고 욕되게 함이라

sentences.original_text: to turn away from their sins again.
sentences.korean_translation: 다시 죄에서 돌이키게 할 수 없습니다.

sentences.original_text: It is like they are killing
the Son of God on the cross again
sentences.korean_translation: 다시 십자가에 못 박힌 하나님의 아들을

sentences.original_text: that they do not think Christ is important.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그리스도를 중요하게 생각하지 않는다는 것을
